Angela Okolo bụ prọfesọ Naijiria nke ọrịa ụmụaka na ahụike ụmụaka, onye na-ahụ maka ụmụ ọhụrụ na ngalaba nke Pediatrics, Federal Medical Center, Asaba na Onye isi oche nke Nigerian Society of Neonatal Medicine (NISONM).
O bụ onye  Delta Stati na Naịjirịa
O malitere njem agụmakwụkwọ ya na St
Theresa's Primary Catholic School Jos, wee gaa St

Louis College Kano maka agụmakwụkwọ sekọndrị ya. O mechara gaa n'ihu na-amụ ọgwụ na Mahadum Lovanium, Kinshasa, DRC Central Africa site na 1965 ruo 1971 ebe ọ nwetakwara akara ugo mmụta nke ːDocteur en Medicine. N'oge na-adịghị anya mgbe ọ malitere ọzụzụ ahụike ya dị ka dọkịta bi na ahụike ụmụaka na Mahadum Benin Teaching Hospital Edo steeti, Naịjirịa n'etiti afọ 1972 na 1977. N'oge ọmụmụ ihe a, ọ nwetara onye otu Royal College of Physician and Surgeons nke Glasgow na 1977 wee bụrụ onye otu Royal Academy of Physicians and Surgeon nke Glasgow na 1987 na onye otu Royal School of Pediatrics and Child Health (UK) na 1997. E mechara họpụta ya dị ka onye nkuzi na Mahadum Benin ebe o mechara bụrụ prọfesọ (1977 ruo 2016).
O bụ onye ndụmọdụ na-ahụ maka ụmụaka na prọfesọ nke pediatrics bụ onye gụrụ akwụkwọ na Neonatology n'okpuru Mahadum nke Benin Teaching Hospital (1972-ruo ụbọchị)
N'ụlọ ọrụ a, ọ na-etinye onwe ya n'ịkụzi na nyocha na neonatology na ahụike perinatal
Ọ na-akụzi na ụlọ akwụkwọ dị iche iche otu n'ime ha bụ Mahadum Delta State
Ọ bụkwa onye Neonatologist na Federal Medical Center Asaba
Ọ rụkọtara ọrụ na ụlọ ọrụ dị iche iche dịka WHO, UNICEF, na ECOWAS n'okpuru West African Health Organization iji melite ahụike ụmụaka
Ọ na-etinye aka na ọrụ dị iche iche ma mepụta ọtụtụ akwụkwọ.

Okolo lụrụ di ma nwee ụmụ abụọ. Ọ bụ onye na-asụ Bekee, ọ na-asukwa Ibo, Hausa, Yoruba, na French nke ọma. Ọ bụ Onye Kraịst nke okwukwe Katọlik, onye otu Catholic Women Organizational na Lady of the Knights of Saint Mulumba(LSM).
